code: import{apiRequest}from'./api';const buildQuery=params=>{const query=new URLSearchParams();if(params.docType)query.set('docType',params.docType);if(typeof params.limit==='number')query.set('limit',String(params.limit));if(typeof params.offset==='number')query.set('offset',String(params.offset));return query.toString();};export const listKnowledgeDocuments=async function(){var _payload$documents;let params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};const query=buildQuery(params);const path=query?"/knowledge?".concat(query):'/knowledge';const payload=await apiRequest(path,{method:'GET'});return(_payload$documents=payload.documents)!==null&&_payload$documents!==void 0?_payload$documents:[];};export const getKnowledgeDocument=async id=>{if(!id){throw new Error('knowledge_id_required');}const payload=await apiRequest("/knowledge/".concat(id),{method:'GET'});return payload.document;};
